Processing and XMonad

After having put up with problems with the Processing IDE for quite a while, I could no longer take not being able to focus the text area without clicking on the stop button.

It transpires this is an issue caused by XMonad’s handling of Java swing applications as noted by Krzysztof Krason in a thread in regard to the IDEA IDE (which also uses Java swing).

It’s not a problem with Intellij but with XMonad, it has problems with java swing applications. The solution is to use something like this in to add “import XMonad.Hooks.ICCCMFocus” and in your logHook add “takeTopFocus”.
